title: Drawing, "Sketches.  Details of the Niagara Falls, part of the Canadian Falls.", possibly 1856
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored wove paper.
markings:
Recto: Stamped at lower right: Lugt 457c
Verso: Stamped at center: Lugt 457d, noir
description: Vertical view of a part of the Canadian side of Niagara Falls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Sketches.  Details of the Niagara Falls, part of the Canadian Falls.", possibly 1856.
possibly 1856. Graphite, brush and white gouache on cream-colored wove paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-145-a.
